definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Attach it to a shoelace or a string, and you've got yourself a fishing line.
sentences.chinese: 把它系在鞋帶或細線上，釣魚線就大功告成了。

sentences.english: The financial system is held together with a very thin filament called confidence.
sentences.chinese: 金融體系只靠一條名爲信心的細線所維繫。

sentences.english: Fine lines used in graphic arts to show shading.
sentences.chinese: 影線在書畫刻印藝術中用於表示陰影部分的細線。

sentences.english: 'She had some fine lines around her lips,' he shrugs.
sentences.chinese: “她嘴脣周圍有一些細線，”他聳了聳肩。

sentences.english: Embedding method is thread sewn into the skin, thereby creating a double eyelid adhesions.
sentences.chinese: 埋線法是將細線縫入皮下，從而製造重瞼的粘連。

sentences.english: The thread to place beads becomes the venation of the gaudery .
sentences.chinese: 穿珠的細線就成爲這一襲華衣的脈絡。

sentences.english: If you change the position of the ines, be sure to readjust the VTA.
sentences.chinese: 如果你改變細線的位置，必須重新調整VTA。

sentences.english: A thin line just on the top eyelid will do the trick.
sentences.chinese: 上眼瞼的一條細線就可以獲得成功了。

sentences.english: Hyperlinks are actually threads that links certain words to their explanations.
sentences.chinese: 超文本鏈接實際是將特定單詞鏈接到其解釋的細線。

sentences.english: He quietly removed thin, crisp, taut energy to climb over a high altitude.
sentences.chinese: 他悄悄地撤去細線，以雄勁的氣力攀登在高空之上。

sentences.english: I was thinking of a brown pin-striped suit.
sentences.chinese: 我正在考慮棕色上紋有細線紋的。

sentences.english: Multi-wire twisting function for supper thin wire, and add production stabilization.
sentences.chinese: 具極細線多股絞線功能，增加產品穩定性。

sentences.english: Lift yourself by pretending strings are pulling you from the tops of your ears.
sentences.chinese: 挺起來，就像有細線從耳朵上方向上拉你一樣。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
